findings.title: Missing HSTS Header
findings.description: Strict-Transport-Security header not found. This allows MITM attacks by forcing HTTP downgrade.

findings.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy
findings.description: CSP header not found. Site vulnerable to XSS attacks.
findings.recommendation: Implement CSP: Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self'

findings.title: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
findings.description: X-Frame-Options not set. Site vulnerable to clickjacking attacks.

findings.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options
findings.description: X-Content-Type-Options not set. Browsers may sniff MIME types.

findings.title: Missing Referrer-Policy
findings.description: Referrer-Policy not set. May leak sensitive information in referrer.
